title: Fruit
subtitle: IoT Energy Management Device - By KiWi Power
paragraphs: As Product Owner, brought the project from 10 to 1000 installed units across Europe with UL safety/cyber security certifications.
- DevOps tooling in Bash, automated testing rigs, Python test analysis tools, Bug discovery, Prototyping.
- Backlog grooming, specification and feature design, retrospective/agile lead, manufacturer onboarding, installation guidance and training, stakeholder engagement.
